__info_description__: Translate words & phrases on web pages. Replenish your personal dictionary. Learn English with millions of people at LinguaLeo.com!
errorNoConnection: Please, check Internet connection and try to open LinguaLeo website. Also try to restart the browser.
serverUpdating: We apologize, but LinguaLeo's server is being updated at the moment and will be available soon. We're making something new!
notAuthStatus: Not authorized. Please, click here to sign in to LinguaLeo.
noMeatballsText: Click here to get more meatballs.
mustBeLessThan: Text for dictionary must be less than $1 symbols long.
optionsUseDblClick: Double click on a word to show popup
optionsShowDictIcons: Show icons of additional online dictionaries
optionsTrademark: LinguaLeo® — registered trademark of LinguaLeo LTD.
releaseNotesTitle: Hi there! LinguaLeo English Translatorv2.0 is speaking.
releaseNotesMainText:
We made it smart enough to not waste your time for reading.
The extension will let you know step-by-step about its features as you browse your favorite places on Internet.
releaseNotesSubText: (reload opened tabs to make the extension work for them)
releaseNotesCreateAccountCall:
Practice English anytime wherever you want
with a personal education plan!
loginDialogCapt: Please, sign in with your LinguaLeo account to translate new words and phrases.
loginDialogEmailIncorrect: Incorrect email or password. Please, try again.
meatballsDialogText1:
Meatballs have finished. You need meatballs to add new words — one per each word.
Leo recommends to buy Gold Status now.
meatballsDialogText2: Well, then just invite one or more friends to LinguaLeo and get meatballs for free.
noContentExtractedText:
LinguaLeo is an artificial intelligence newbie
and couldn't understand a useful content that can be extracted from this page.

Please, try to repeat with another page.
helpEnjoyContentWelcome_Text1: {USERNAME}, it seems the page is in English language. LinguaLeo wants to help you enjoy the content.
helpEnjoyContentWelcome_Text2: "Enjoy Content!" mode cleans a page text from ads and other garbage, so you're enjoying while reading and learning the language simultaneously.
helpEnjoyContentExplain_Text1:
Looks better, isn't it? :)
Simply mouseover unknown words and click them to see possible translations.
helpEnjoyContentExplain_Text2: Once you clicked a word and choosed a translation, the word will be added to your dictionary.
helpEnjoyContentControlsExplain_Text1:
Sometimes LinguaLeo will automatically show this icon for English-written pages.

To disable the icon — just mouseover it and wait a couple of seconds.
helpEnjoyContentExplainNoContent_Text1: Sometimes LinguaLeo can't simplify a page for reading. For example, when the page consists of a lot of similar text blocks.
helpEnjoyContentExplainNoContent_Text2: "Enjoy content!" feature works good on pages with a long rich text. For example, a blog article or a news report. Try to find such a page.
registrationRequired_Text1_2: Create a free account at LinguaLeo! Translate more words and practice English anytime from anywhere using Android, iPhone or Windows Phone devices!
vkLyrics_Text1: LinguaLeo Extension now supports VKontakte lyrics! Click a name of any song with English text.
youtubeExport_Text1: Youtube videos with English subtitles can be watched with LinguaLeo and wonderful interactive subtitles.
noTranslationsMessage: Sorry, there is no translation for this text.
placeholderTextToTranslate: type a text to translate, hit Enter
notificationTitleSignIn: Please, click here to sign in to LinguaLeo account.
wordNotSynced: Not synced yet. Sign in to LinguaLeo account to move it into online dictionary.
demoContextText:
One night I shot an elephant
in my pijama.
